description:
Have you ever struggled taking a Python application from your local
machine to the cloud? Had a hard time figuring out what infrastructure
you need or how to configure it for your app? Spent too much time
researching how to set up your local development environment for cloud
development? Learn how to use real-world cloud development application
templates via CLI to go from local development environment to the cloud.
Scaffold your application, provision resources, deploy code, monitor
your application health, and set up a CI/CD pipeline, all in a couple of
steps and just a few minutes.
title: Accelerate your workflow from local Python prototype to the cloud (Sponsor: Microsoft)
